commit message: Updated campus map to 2015 edition.
Improve readability of up navigation code in EventDetailsActivity and add missing flags in the Manifest file for it.
Added warning message instead of crash when no compatible calendar app is found.
Removed restriction to only use Google Maps for directions if installed, allowing to use third-party apps or a browser.

Added Http cache awareness
to skip updating the database when the remote file has not changed.
Update Gradle plugin to 1.1
Misc. small cleanups
Workaround to support 'If-Modified-Since' conditional HTTP requests on web servers supporting GZIP compression, also enabling GZIP compression support on Android 2.1 and 2.2.
Upgrade Gradle Android plugin
Moved launcher icon to mipmap resource folders for better scaling on modern devices.

Replaced the ListView main menu with a ScrollView and an AdapterLinearLayout.
It makes the layout simpler and fixes focus issues in keypad navigation mode.
Updated Floating Action Button style to the official guidelines.
Set alarms at the exact time instead of having them batched and delayed on Kitkat and above.
Regression fix: main menu background not properly applied to the entire menu zone.
Moved all build config values to build.gradle
Improved ListView styling by using built-in attribute listChoiceBackgroundIndicator

Migrate to AppCompat 23.1.1
Removed legacy hacks
Material dialogs on older versions

Implemented backport version of simple_list_item_2 for Material Design
and removed custom secondary text color on older Android versions
Fixed time formatting to properly use the device's current Locale.
Updated Navigation Drawer in MainActivity to comply with latest material design guidelines.
Fixed 'DB last updated' date format
Added a fix for crashes while zooming in PhotoView inside a DrawerLayout.
New app icon, more material-ish

Dynamic toolbar elevation in MainActivity
depending on the current section.
Migrate to Android Gradle Plugin 1.5.0
Various display fixes
Replaced FOSDEM title image with a vector drawable
Backwards-compatible material simple_list_item_1 layout
Delayed drawer menu actions until the menu is closed.
Ensure the bookmarks ActionMode is closed when the fragment is destroyed.
Enhanced list item layouts and make them RTL-compatible.
Added RTL support

Re-indented SQL queries in DatabaseManager
for better readability
Deleted commented line

Highlight date-time in bookmarks list for conflicting schedules
Fixes #4
Replaced deprecated Resources.getColor() with ContextCompat.getColor()
Updated app version number to 1.3.5
Workaround for AppCompat bug incorrectly coloring links on API 21-22
